attributes.title: Dickson's Farmstand
attributes.description:
Created on May 2, 2011 by mkc330 on Sourcemap.org:

Bob Comis drives the slaughtered pigs to Chelsea Market, Dickson's Farmstand. Here the pigs are butchered and sold to New Yorkers. The farm stand is run by Jake Dickson; he maintains all of his meat from local and small-family-run farms.
